About the Company: Monsanto India Limited (MIL), a subsidiary of Monsanto, (USA), is a research based biotechnology company was incorporated on 8th December 1949 as a private limited Company at Mumbai, manufactures agro chemicals and hybrid seeds. It also markets Avadex, an herbicide used on wheat crops. MIL has a chemical production unit at Silvassa, hybrid seeds units at Bellary in Karnataka and Eluru in Andhra Pradesh and a packing unit at Guwahati. The Company has pioneered the chemical-weed-control concept in the country and is a market leader in rice herbicides which are marketed under the brand name `MACHETE`. MIL`s status was converted from private limited to public limited on 1st July of the year 1978. The Company had launched a wheat herbicide and marketed several specialty chemicals of Monsanto, USA as an agent in the year of 1990.
